name: Particle Accelerator (rickylee)
description:
A 2-part arcade mobile-game, with upgrades and a few surprises! Short and sweet with only 6 levels... and a secret 7th maybe? :)

Tap at the right time to accelerate. Timing gets harder as you speed up - so buy all the upgrades to go faster than light.

Now launch! Collect as much light as possible by moving around. Avoid red particles that slow you down and hit green particles to speed up. Go far enough and you'll  unlock more levels.

All unlockable cosmetics are obtainable without opting for the mobile ads or in-app purchases (100% hidden ads except for the most hardcore of casual gamers). Earn gold stars by upgrading everything on each level, these gold stars will unlock the cosmetics.

  • Coming soon to iOS
